content:
Have a look at this article, from Cleveland Clinic. Directly relevant to our newly created project Corrections To Errors in the Record. They're seeking input. Attention project leads @Debi Willis @Abigail Watson
image.png

image.png
image.png
I love this Dave. I am not able to find the article. They say they welcome recommendations from others...do they give an email address to engage with them?

Fantastic find. I've been planning to renew my JAMIA membership, and have been writing a COVID19 related paper detailing our experience using Synthea and FHIR to model the pandemic, which I am planning to submit in the upcoming month. I think this could be an excellent topic to write a subsequent paper on. JAMIA has turned its attention to FHIR of late, and are receptive to submissions using it as an internal data format, I believe.
If any of you would like to participate in a paper in response, based on the Patient Data Writeback IG, it could maybe even be a work product from the Patient Empowerment workgroup.
Yes, i would like to participate in the paper response. Who is heading that up?

Probably me, in so far as I have had a membership in AMIA in the past and am planning on submitting some other papers this month or next anyhow.

Disclaimer: I've been working with a department at Laurie's Children's Hospital on a grant on this topic. We're already circulating a slide deck and executive summary that include this particular topic.
